db:abstract.db:para: Generates a Shader Program content from loaded graphs.

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: A shader program builder consists of several different shader graphs used to generate shader code.

A cache of generated shader code is maintained. Generated shaders are by defaults saved in QStandardPaths::writableLocation(QStandardPaths::TempLocation)). This path can be overridden by setting environment variable QT3D_WRITABLE_CACHE_PATH to a valid writable path.
The use of the cache can be disabled by setting environment variable QT3D_DISABLE_SHADER_CACHE.

In most cases, changes made to a graph are detected by Qt 3D and a new cache entry will be generated. One case were this will not happen is when code snippets included by a graphs are changed. To work around that, clearing the cache directory or setting environment variable QT3D_REBUILD_SHADER_CACHE can be used to force shader code to be generated again.

db:section.db:title: [read-only] computeShaderCode : string
db:section.db:para: Holds the generated compute shader code

db:section.db:title: enabledLayers : stringlist
db:section.db:para: Holds the list of layers this builder will activate on the shader graphs during code generation.

db:section.db:title: [read-only] fragmentShaderCode : string
db:section.db:para: Holds the generated fragment shader code

db:section.db:title: [read-only] geometryShaderCode : string
db:section.db:para: Holds the generated geometry shader code

db:section.db:title: shaderProgram : string
db:section.db:para: Holds the shader program on which this builder generates code.

db:section.db:title: [read-only] tessellationControlShaderCode : string
db:section.db:para: Holds the generated tessellation control shader code

db:section.db:title: [read-only] tessellationEvaluationShaderCode : string
db:section.db:para: Holds the generated tessellation evaluation shader code

db:section.db:title: [read-only] vertexShaderCode : string
db:section.db:para: Holds the generated vertex shader code
